int setColumnToMinimalWidth ( int column ) [virtual]
 

Sets a column to its miminum required width to completely display its contents. Returns this width

int compare ( const CListEntry * entry ) [virtual]
 

Compare to list entries. This is used for sorting the list when clicking on the column titles

RoboticObject * getRoboticObject ( )
 

Returns the Robotic Object for the List entry.

bool isEntryMarked ( )
 

Checks to see if the object is registered in the object manager or not.

Returns:
true: if registered. false: if unregistered.

void setMarkRegistered ( )
 

Sets the status of the list entry as registered by the object manager.

void setMarkUnregistered ( )
 

Sets the status of the list entry as unregistered by the object manager.

void updateObjectEntry ( )
 

Updates the properties of the existing objects in the flexlist.
